sentence.Network_en: He and I have talked through this whole tricky problem.
sentence.Network_cn: 他和我把这个棘手的问题整个儿都讨论清楚了。

sentence.Network_en: It's been a tricky business marketing his new invention.
sentence.Network_cn: 推广他的新发明一直是件棘手的事情。

sentence.Network_en: But the whole question of aid is a tricky political one.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是整个援助问题是个非常复杂的政治问题。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... clumsy 笨拙的 tricky 狡猾的 hairy 毛茸茸的.
棘手(tricky)的部分：我们能从短信息服务的经历中学习到什么，是任何事情吗？大家都知道商业和科技发展的奇怪的随即行走特征； …
考博英语词汇 ... trick n. 诡计，花招；哄骗;欺骗 tricky a. 狡猾的；复杂的；棘手的 trifle n. 少量，少许；小事，琐事.
考博英语词汇 ... trick n. 诡计，花招；哄骗;欺骗 tricky a. 狡猾的；复杂的；棘手的 trifle n. 少量，少许；小事，琐事.

list.abs: Question是什么意思？_百度知道 ... spot questions (考试)押题 tricky question 偏题, 怪题 yes-or-no question 是非问句.
张雪娇的空间 ... I swear. 我对天发誓。 Nothing tricky. 别耍花招。 You might at least apologize. 你顶多道个歉就得了。.
鬼_互动百科 ... 31. 鬼黠[ cunning] 25. 鬼祟[ (of conduct) dishonorable, tricky] (2)同本义[ devil;apparition;ghost].
这不规则的部分则需要另外记住。我们将它们归类为捣蛋字(tricky words)。

entry.tran: 难办的;难对付的;棘手的
entry.def: If you describe a task or problem as tricky, you mean that it is difficult to do or deal with.

example.ex: Parking can be tricky in the town centre...
example.tran: 在市中心泊车可能很困难。

example.ex: It's a very tricky problem, but I think there are a number of things you can do.
example.tran: 那是个非常棘手的问题，但我想有几样事你是可以做到的。

entry.tran: 诡计多端的;奸诈的;狡猾的
entry.def: If you describe a person as tricky, you mean that they are likely to deceive you or cheat you.

sentences.sentence: "how extraordinarily slippery a liar the camera is"- James Agee
"they called Reagan the teflon president because mud never stuck to him"
